function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination during RNA extraction process","Impact":"Inaccurate test results, spread of contaminants","Mitigation":"Use strict aseptic techniques, proper decontamination of equipment","Technologies":"Aseptic techniques, decontamination equipment","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Improper handling of sewage samples","Impact":"Spread of infectious agents, health risks","Mitigation":"Use appropriate personal protective equipment, follow biosafety protocols","Technologies":"Personal protective equipment, biosafety protocols","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"},{"Description":"Failure to properly disinfect the work area","Impact":"Cross-contamination of samples, spread of infectious agents","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of work surfaces and equipment, use of appropriate disinfectants","Technologies":"Disinfectants, surface decontamination equipment","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management"}]}
